import React from 'react' import useInput from '../../hooks/use-input' import styles from './ConfirmationForm.module.css' import Button from '../UI/Button' const checkIsEmpty = (value) => value.trim() !== '' const ConfirmationForm = () => { const { enteredValue: firstNameVAlue, isTouched: firstNameIsTouched, hasError: firstNameError, changeValueHandler: firstNameValueHandler, inputBlurHandler: firstNameBlurHandler, reset: firstNameReset } = useInput(checkIsEmpty) return (
{firstNameError &&

First name should not be empty

}
) } export default ConfirmationForm
